h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Celestial Lotus Seeds Location
content: The Celestial Lotus Seeds Soak in Black Myth: Wukong can be found in Bamboo Grove \- Marsh of White Mist Shrine in Black Wind Mountain after talking to the Shen Monkey Vendor upon freeing him from the enemy attacking him.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Celestial_Lotus_Seeds.md', within the main section titled 'Celestial Lotus Seeds', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Celestial Lotus Seeds Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Celestial Lotus Seeds Soak in Black Myth: Wukong can be found in Bamboo Grove \- Marsh of White Mist Shrine in Black Wind Mountain after talking to the Shen Monkey Vendor upon freeing him from the enemy attacking him.
